member.name: SCHANNEL_CLIENT_SIGNATURE
member.summary: Specifies a client signature when a call to the function cannot access the private key for a client certificate (in this case, the function returns SEC_I_SIGNATURE_NEEDED).

member.name: SCHANNEL_CLIENT_SIGNATURE.cbLength
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of this structure.

member.name: SCHANNEL_CLIENT_SIGNATURE.aiHash
member.summary: The ID of the algorithm used to compute the hash of the certificate.

member.name: SCHANNEL_CLIENT_SIGNATURE.cbHash
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the HashValue array.

member.name: SCHANNEL_CLIENT_SIGNATURE.HashValue
member.summary: An array of byte values that specify the hash of the certificate.

member.name: SCHANNEL_CLIENT_SIGNATURE.CertThumbprint
member.summary: An array of byte values that specify the certificate thumbprint.
